method: In a bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and sugar.
In a separate bowl, melt the butter and mix with the milk and vanilla extract.
Slowly pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, mixing until well combined.
Divide the batter evenly among a lined muffin tin.
Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.
While the cupcakes cool, prepare the frosting.
In a mixing bowl, combine the confectioners' sugar and lemon juice.
Once the cupcakes are completely cooled, frost them with the lemon frosting.
Garnish with additional capers, if desired.
